Class ElementList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ElementList

  • public class ElementList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets up the arraylist for all compounds and elements, which are read in from multiple text files.
    Version:
    1.5, May 22th, 2014
    Author:
    Benson Guo

      ArrayList of Strings to store metal symbols.

      ArrayList of Strings to store non-metal symbols.

      • ElementList

        public ElementList()
        Constructor that calls readFiles method.

    • Method Detail

      • readFiles

        private void readFiles()
        This method reads the text files of the compounds and elements and stores them in the instance level arraylists.
        Parameters:
        e-variable - to catch for IOException, NoSuchElementException.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown to indicate an error when reading from text file.
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - Thrown to indicate an error when reading string from textfile.

      • randElement

        public Element randElement()
        This method generates a random element for the gameboard. Math.random () is used to pick either a metal or a non-metal, and select one of them at random.
        Parameters:
        symbol-String - variable for the compound symbol name.
        rand-int - variable for random element.
        Returns:
        a new random element object

      • checkCompound

        public java.lang.String checkCompound(java.lang.String compoundSymbol)
        String return method that returns the correct compound name that corresponds to a symbol.
        Parameters:
        compoundSymbol-tring - variable for the symbol of the compound the user is naming.
        Returns:
        the compound name corresponding to the passed in symbol

      • canForm

        public boolean canForm(Element a,
              Element b)
        Boolean return method that returns whether or not two elements can form a compound. One element must be a non-metal, and one a metal.The if statements also checks to make sure the elements are not null and are not barriers.
        Parameters:
        a-parameter - passed in for 1st element.
        b-parameter - passed in for 2nd element.
        Returns:
        true if a compound can be formed, otherwise false.

      • isMetal

        public boolean isMetal(Element e)
        Boolean return method that returns whether or not an element is a metal. It checks the metal list for the element name.
        Parameters:
        e-parameter - passed in for element.
        Returns:
        true if the element is a metal, otherwise false.
